comment:
Mash at 111 for 10 min. (.8 qt/lb.)  Strike water around 120.
Heat to 125 and mash for 10 min.
Heat to 144 and mash for 40 min.
Decoct enough grain to raise to 161 for 20 min.

Mashed at 108F for 5 min.  Heated up more water and added to 
mash at 111F for 5 min.
Added water to get to 126F for 10 min.
Added water to get to 144F.  Mashed for 40 min.  Was at 142F at end.
Heated the big pot to 180F and added to mash.  Also added more water to get to 161F.
Mashed for 20 more min.
Mash was stuck so I bailed with a collander.
Had enough wort that I didn't have to sparge.

7.1 gallons x 41 = 289.05
5.5 gallons x .48 = 264
25.05 better than predicted.
Bottled 4.5 gallons over 7.5 oz corn sugar.  Should be 4.0 vol of CO2.
